common.description: Essential developer tools, code sharing, forum, and community — all in one platform.

jsonFormatter.title: JSON Formatter
jsonFormatter.description: Format, validate & minify JSON with syntax highlighting
jsonFormatter.inputSubtitle: Paste or type your JSON here

regexTester.title: Regex Tester
regexTester.description: Test regular expressions with real-time match highlighting

base64Encoder.title: Base64 / URL Encoder
base64Encoder.description: Encode & decode Base64 and URL strings instantly

colorConverter.title: Color Converter
colorConverter.description: Convert between HEX, RGB & HSL with palette generation

uuidGenerator.title: UUID & Hash Generator
uuidGenerator.description: Generate UUIDs and compute SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512 hashes

jwtDecoder.title: JWT Decoder
jwtDecoder.description: Decode JSON Web Tokens and inspect header, payload & expiry
jwtDecoder.tokenSubtitle: Paste your JSON Web Token below

timestampConverter.title: Timestamp Converter
timestampConverter.description: Convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable dates

loremGenerator.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
loremGenerator.description: Generate placeholder text in paragraphs, sentences or words
loremGenerator.startClassic: Start with "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..."

hero.title: Developer Tools &
hero.subtitle: 8 essential developer utilities — fast, private, and fully client-side. Plus a growing community for sharing code, solving problems, and connecting with developers worldwide.

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: Professional developer tools that respect your privacy. All processing happens in your browser.
features.clientSideDesc: No data ever leaves your browser. Your code stays yours.
features.fastDesc: Instant results with zero server round-trips.
features.openDesc: No accounts required for tools. No ads. No tracking.

toolsSection.title: Developer Tools
toolsSection.subtitle: Essential utilities for your daily workflow

settings.usernameHint: Lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only.
